meta.home: AI-powered stock price predictions for Middle East markets including Egypt, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait, Qatar, and Bahrain. Updated daily forecasts with confidence scores.
meta.markets: Browse all Middle East stock markets including TASI, EGX, ADX, DFM, and more. View AI-powered price predictions and market statistics for each exchange.
meta.marketDetail: View AI-powered price predictions for {market} market. Get detailed asset statistics, top gainers, and confident forecasts for {marketName}.
meta.sectors: Explore stock predictions by sector including Banking, Energy, Real Estate, and more. AI-powered analysis across Middle East markets.
meta.sectorDetail: AI-powered price predictions for {sector} sector stocks. View forecasts, top gainers, and market analysis for {sector} companies.
meta.predictions: Browse all AI-generated stock price predictions across Middle East markets. Filter by market, sector, horizon, and confidence level.
meta.assetDetail: AI price prediction for {symbol} ({name}). View current price, predicted price, confidence score, and technical indicators.
meta.search: Search for any stock in Middle East markets. Find AI-powered price predictions by symbol or company name.
meta.about: Learn about Horin's AI-powered stock price prediction platform for Middle East markets. Discover our methodology, accuracy, and mission.
meta.methodology: Understand how Horin generates AI stock price predictions. Learn about our methodology, confidence scores, and how to interpret forecasts.
meta.faq: Frequently asked questions about Horin's AI stock predictions. Get answers about accuracy, methodology, and how to use our platform.
meta.contact: Contact the Horin team for support, partnerships, or questions about our AI stock prediction platform for Middle East markets.
meta.terms: Terms and conditions for using Horin's AI stock prediction platform. Read our user agreement, disclaimers, and service terms.
meta.privacy: Privacy policy for Horin's stock prediction platform. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your data.

methodology.title: Accuracy & Methodology
methodology.subtitle: How predictions are generated and how to interpret them.

meaning.label: Meaning
meaning.value: Predictions are estimated future prices based on historical data patterns.

scope.label: Scope
scope.value: Only price movement. No sentiment. No fundamentals. No external events.

output.label: Output
output.value: A predicted price and a confidence score for each horizon.

collection.label: Data collection
collection.value: The system reads historical price data for each asset.

extraction.label: Feature extraction
extraction.value: It calculates volatility, trend direction, momentum, and price behavior over different periods.

evaluation.label: Model evaluation
evaluation.value: Multiple models run in parallel. The system selects the most stable model for each asset.

prediction.label: Prediction generation
prediction.value: The chosen model outputs a future estimated price for each horizon.

confidence.label: Confidence calculation
confidence.value: Score reflects how consistent the model's pattern detection was for that specific asset.

horizons.title: Horizons

short.label: Short
short.value: Near-term movement. More sensitive to volatility.

horizons.note: Only the horizons displayed on each asset page are supported.

purpose.label: Purpose
purpose.value: Measure model stability for a given prediction.

notGuarantee.label: Not a guarantee
notGuarantee.value: The score does not mean success probability. It only reflects data consistency.

news.label: Sudden news
news.value: Reduces accuracy. Models cannot anticipate events.

history.label: Limited history
history.value: Models struggle with assets that have short trading history.

noRealtime.label: No real-time insight
noRealtime.value: Predictions rely on historical patterns, not breaking news.

noFundamentals.label: No fundamentals
noFundamentals.value: Earnings, announcements, or macro factors are not included.

notAdvice.label: Not investment advice
notAdvice.value: Predictions are informational. User decisions are their responsibility.

dataRefresh.label: Data refresh
dataRefresh.value: Prices update as new market data arrives.

predictionRefresh.label: Prediction refresh
predictionRefresh.value: Predictions regenerate after new data is processed.

variation.label: Variation
variation.value: Some assets update more frequently depending on data quality.

compare.label: Compare horizons
compare.value: Check short and long predictions to see consistency.

followTrends.label: Follow trends
followTrends.value: Use predictions as one signal, not the only one.

avoidOverreliance.label: Avoid overreliance
avoidOverreliance.value: Always consider risk. Markets change quickly.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.content: If you want clarification about methodology, contact support through the

whatDoes.a: It provides AI-generated stock price predictions for Middle East markets.

guaranteed.a: No. Predictions are estimates based on historical patterns. They are not guarantees.

updateFrequency.a: Predictions update when new market data becomes available. Update frequency depends on each market.

confidenceScore.a: The confidence score shows how strong or stable the model's prediction is for that asset. Higher scores reflect more consistent patterns.

howToUse.a: Use predictions as one input when evaluating a stock. Do not rely on predictions alone.

markets.a: Major markets in the Middle East, including Egypt, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait, Qatar, and Bahrain.

trading.a: No. The platform does not support buying or selling stocks.

financialInfo.q: Do you store my financial information?
financialInfo.a: No. We do not collect or store any trading or banking data.

horizons.q: Why do predictions differ across horizons?
horizons.a: Short, medium, and long horizons capture different market behaviors. Each horizon reflects a different time frame of price movement.

accuracy.a: Volatility, unusual events, lack of historical data, and sudden market changes can reduce model accuracy.

negative.a: Yes. If the model expects a price drop, predicted values can be lower than the current price.

missing.q: Why is an asset missing a prediction?
missing.a: The model may skip assets without enough data or assets with unstable patterns that do not fit the prediction model.

reportIssue.q: How can I report an issue?

whatWeDo.title: What we do
whatWeDo.content: We provide AI-powered stock price predictions for markets in the Middle East. Our system analyzes price history, market movement, and technical signals to estimate future price levels.

whatWeDont.title: What we don't do
whatWeDont.content: We do not offer trading services. We do not give investment advice. Predictions are informational only.

howItWorks.title: How predictions work
howItWorks.content: Predictions are generated by automated models. These models process historical prices, volatility levels, and market patterns to produce future estimates and confidence scores.

whyWeBuilt.title: Why we built this
whyWeBuilt.content: Investors struggle to understand market direction. We built a simple tool that gives clear forward-looking signals without noise.

whatToExpect.title: What you can expect
whatToExpect.content: Fast access to upcoming price predictions. Clear gain/loss expectations. Confidence scores. Sector and market filtering. No distractions.

whatWeDontTrack.title: What we don't track
whatWeDontTrack.content: We do not track your investment accounts. We do not collect sensitive financial data.

whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.content: A small team building simple tools for better market insight.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.content: Reach out to us on our

collect.title: What we collect
collect.content: We collect your name and email for account access. We collect usage data to improve predictions. We collect logs for security. We do not collect financial data or bank details.

use.title: How we use your data
use.content: We use your data to operate the service. We use logs to detect issues. We use usage data to improve accuracy. We never sell or trade your data.

predictions.title: Predictions data
predictions.content: Predictions are generated by automated systems. Predictions are not linked to personal identity.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use simple cookies to keep you signed in. We do not use tracking cookies.

thirdParties.title: Third parties
thirdParties.content: We use hosting providers and analytics tools. They follow strict data rules. They cannot use your data for their own purposes.

storage.title: Data storage
storage.content: We store data on secure servers. We use encryption. We keep access logs.

retention.title: Data retention
retention.content: We keep your account data while your account is active. We remove most data when you close your account. Some logs may stay longer for security.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.content: You can request a copy of your data. You can request deletion. You can update your account information.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Email our support team for any privacy concerns.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.message: If you have questions about predictions, your account, or technical issues, send us a message.

responseTime.title: Response Time
responseTime.content: We aim to reply within 1-2 business days.

include.title: What to Include
include.description: A short description of the issue

links.text: You may also want to review our

scope.title: Service scope
scope.content: Our service provides predicted stock prices. The service does not support trading.

noAdvice.title: No investment advice
noAdvice.content: Predictions are automated. Predictions are not guarantees. You are responsible for your investment decisions.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: You must be an adult in your country. You must agree to these terms.

account.title: Account rules
account.content: Keep your login secure. Do not share your account. Do not misuse the service.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable use
acceptableUse.content: Do not scrape data. Do not attempt to attack or disrupt the system. Do not copy or resell predictions.

changes.title: Changes
changes.content: We may update predictions models, design, and system behavior without notice.

availability.title: Availability
availability.content: The service may go down for maintenance or technical issues. We do not guarantee uptime.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: We are not liable for losses related to stock trading or investment actions. The platform is informational only.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend accounts that break rules. You may close your account at any time.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Email our support team for help or complaints.
